this is the best most sexiest game ever

Counter Strike. The name itself has the power to bring up nostalgic memories. It has the ability for making new online friends, playing on memorable maps. And most of all, delivering great times. On this profile it only shows I've played 10 hours as of now. But I use to play it constantly at a buddy's house. The classic Bomb gametype is incredibly fun. Weapons are good (But manage to kick more than a friggin Retro Lancer), and the gameplay is superb. The only thing I have a minor complaint about is that there are very few game modes. I would like to see CTF, TDM, or DM. But I'm pretty sure you can download those gametypes of the internet somewhere. But that hardly has an effect on the brilliant game. Modern Warfare's search and destroy owes everthing to Counter Strike because it's basically a direct copy. Even after all these years Counter Strike aka the greatest mod of all time continues to shine. And it will shine on for many years to come. Cheers for all the great times you have given us Counter Strike. Two thumbs up and gets a 94%
Counter Strike Source took my Life away! Curse you Surf :P (Jk's I love u Surf <3)

INTENSE FPS SHOOTER, (WARNING) learning curve for multiplayer is very tough and understand that people have been playing this game for years. Not a lot of variety of weapons with the base game but addons and mods make up for that with user created/reskined weapons. This game is more of a run & gun FPS. Medium Recommendation because Counter Strike: Global offensive is a much better improvement over this title.

My computer was not a high end computer, so I had to find an FPS game that can work with my PC. This has to be one of the best FPS games ive played in my lifetime. It is also amazing how this games servers are still going strong after around 8 years.

I LOVE this game. I may not play it as much as my other games, but I have endless fun when I do. Absolutely worth the money, and I'd recommend the combo pack with Garry's Mod so you get a discount. My only issue is that my friends prefer the more updated version of the game, Counter Strike: Global Offensive, but I can live with it :)

I don't feel that this game is as good as Garry's Mod, but that is entirely opinionated. I would recommend this game when on sale, like I usually buy games on. This is also definately a game to mess around with friends on, battle with online players, and learn the different mechanics of, such as the idea of surfing, and perhaps b hopping.
